WRITING.TITLE: Anime similar to Aggretsuko 3rd season
WRITING.TEXT: I'm searching for an anime/manga that has the kind of relationship that Haida and Retsuko have in the 3rd season, you know non reciprocal love but more adult.
I believe you'd like "Maou Gakuin no Futekigousha", it's still in emission, the MC is literally OP.

We are playing it in roll20 but without buying the module, our GM simply searches the maps, and I think it's going pretty well. He has the books given from another GM in digital. I think there's no need to buy it, but that's related to the amount of work you are willing to do.

WRITING.TITLE: Start with Hell's rebels?
WRITING.TEXT: Hello, I'm a new GM and i last week I ran a one-shot because my friends wanted to try. As a player I'm fairly new also, I've been playing ROTL for a few months and I'm at the begging of 3rd book. That appart, everyone was pretty excited and liked the one-shot. Now they wanna play a larger adventure with the characters from said one-shot (because they leveled up). Question is should I start with Hell's rebels? If not, which do you recommend? I'm trying to avoid anything related to ROTL and Kingmaker. Thank u. Edit: Players are a Druid with a big cat, an unchained monk, an unchained barbarian, a bard and an unchained rogue.
Thank, I'll check it.
Some of them likes to roleplay, but there are two that are really really new, I mean the first contact with this type of games is the one-shot and they didn't roleplay much...
